description: Detects the execution of System Informer, a task manager tool to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level operations
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: System Informer is regularly used legitimately by system administrators or developers. Apply additional filters accordingly
name: PUA - System Informer Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\SystemInformer.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"SystemInformer.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"System Informer") OR (Product:"System Informer") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=19426363A37C03C3ED6FEDF57B6696EC* OR *SHA1\=8B12C6DA8FAC0D5E8AB999C31E5EA04AF32D53DC* OR *SHA256\=8EE9D84DE50803545937A63C686822388A3338497CDDB660D5D69CF68B68F287* OR *IMPHASH\=B68908ADAEB5D662F87F2528AF318F12*)) OR (md5:"19426363A37C03C3ED6FEDF57B6696EC") OR (sha1:"8B12C6DA8FAC0D5E8AB999C31E5EA04AF32D53DC") OR (sha256:"8EE9D84DE50803545937A63C686822388A3338497CDDB660D5D69CF68B68F287") OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:"B68908ADAEB5D662F87F2528AF318F12"))
